sourcesContent:
import { Box, Divider, FormControl, Grid, TextField, Typography } from '@mui/material' import { Container } from '@mui/system' import React from 'react' import Accordion from '@mui/material/Accordion'; import AccordionDetails from '@mui/material/AccordionDetails'; import AccordionSummary from '@mui/material/AccordionSummary'; import ExpandMoreIcon from '@mui/icons-material/ExpandMore'; import { getFAQs } from '../util/AdminUtil'; const Contact = () => { const faqs = getFAQs(); return ( Customer Care Whether you have a question regarding our coffee products, our retail cafes, our wholesale business, or our website, we can help you out. Please scroll to the bottom of the page to check out our answers to Frequently Asked Questions. Contact Us FAQS
{faqs.map(faq => { return } aria-controls={`panel-${faq.idx}-content`} id={`panel-${faq.idx}-header`} > {faq.question} {faq.answer} })}
) } export default Contact
